text: Jose Calayag Reyes Jr. (born September 18, 1950) is a former Associate Justice of the Supreme Court of the Philippines. Previously, he served on the Philippine Court of Appeals for 15 years. He was also a state deputy in the Knights of Columbus and was elected to the Order's Supreme Board of Directors in 2016. With his wife, Maria, he has three children. ==References== Category:1950 births category:Knights of Columbus Category:Living people Category:Associate Justices of the Supreme Court of the Philippines Category:Place of birth missing (living people) Category:Justices of the Court of Appeals of the Philippines
title: Jose Reyes Jr.
